DOC.brief_title: Variability Measurement WBCT Between Blood Drawn From Indwelling Catheters Direct Venipuncture
DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed dated , write informed consent ( Institutional Review Board [ IRB ] approve informed consent form [ ICF ] ) . 2 . Healthy ( determined medical history ) male female subject age 18 65 year ( inclusive ) suitable vein venipuncture . 1 . Healthy subject conform inclusion criterion . 2 . Healthy subject communicate reliably Investigator . 3 . History major bleed major trauma within past 6 month 4 . Healthy volunteer propensity bleed ( i.e . due recent trauma , recent surgery , peptic ulcer , active recent gastrointestinal bleeding bleed hemorrhoid ) . 5 . Significant infection know inflammatory process within 2 week screen . 6 . Treatment investigational product therapy within 30 day ( 5 half life , whichever great ) prior screen . 7 . Received nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAID ) medication ( include aspirin ) direct effect hemostasis within 7 day test 8 . Unwillingness inability comply procedure require protocol . 9 . Subjects concurrently enrol clinical study .
